description.value:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You blind or dazzle a creature.

You've spent considerable time practicing the manipulation of light, weaponizing your blade's reflection or bolstering the luminosity of magical displays to unconventional heights. Extend the duration of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] condition you give the target by 1 round.
